sections.summary:
Seasoned Design and Construction Project Manager with more than 13 years' experience in managing multimillion projects in the US and abroad.
Expertise in coordinating and overseeing all aspects of design and construction, from conceptualization to completion, while providing continuous
status reports to business owners and investors. Proven track record of achieving construction goals and consistently completing projects on time
and budget. Fluency in English and Italian with working knowledge of Spanish and French. Seeking to leverage success and experience to take
next career step in a challenging project management position with a respected institution in Connecticut.
